Uses of Package
org.chabala.brick.controllab

  • Packages that use org.chabala.brick.controllab 
    Package Description
    org.chabala.brick.controllab
    Library for controlling the LEGO® control lab interface.
    org.chabala.brick.controllab.jssc
    Isolates the serial communication library from the rest of the library.
  • Classes in org.chabala.brick.controllab used by org.chabala.brick.controllab 
    Class and Description
    ControlLab
    Object to represent interacting with the LEGO® control lab interface.
    Direction
    Identifiers for the direction of output ports on the control lab.
    Input
    Identifiers for the input ports on the control lab.
    Output
    Identifiers for the output ports on the control lab.
    PowerLevel
    Identifiers for the power level of output ports on the control lab.
    SensorValue
    The values obtained from reading an Input.
    SerialPort
    Interface to separate serial port clients from implementation.
    StopButtonEvent
    The event triggered by interacting with the red stop button on the control lab.
    StopButtonListener
    The listener interface for receiving stop button events.
  • Classes in org.chabala.brick.controllab used by org.chabala.brick.controllab.jssc 
    Class and Description
    SerialPort
    Interface to separate serial port clients from implementation.
    SerialPortFactory
    Interface to separate listing and obtaining serial ports from implementation.
